body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Security. My name is Paul Thomas. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Andrea. To assist you better, could you provide me with your address using letters, such as S T R E E T and not numbers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I live on O N E two T H R E E Main Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Andrea. Can you also tell me the name of your first pet using the alphabet instead of numbers?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my first pet's name is S A M.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Andrea. Is there anything else you would like to share or ask about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, I'm a bit confused about the security procedures.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: No problem, Andrea. I'll explain everything to you. Thank you for reaching out to us and for your time.
